column1: '''Nils-Lennart Johannesson''' is Professor of English Linguistics at [[Wikipedia:Stockholm University|Stockholm University]]
column3: the history of the English language
column4: and [[Old English|Old]] and [[Middle English]].<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.english.su.se/about-us/contact/academic-staff/nils-lennart-johannesson-1.31847|articlename=Nils-Lennart Johannesson|dated=|website=[http://www.english.su.se/ Department of English
column5: Stockholm University]|accessed=31 December 2011}}</ref> He has been a member of the board of directors of Arda-sällskapet (the Arda Society)
column6: and published several articles about [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s works.<ref>[List of contributors]
